Unzip USBINC file and rename the increase.bin to increase-<board><custom index>. Such as:

unzip EDISON_001_XMH811D_4096M_32G_LC860EQY-FJA4_3840x2160_255_AP7_86C_4K_20190107180322_V1.0.10_USBINC_QQ.zip
mv increase.bin increase-D001.bin 


At present the increase have follow type:

EDISON_001_XMH811D_4096M_32G_LC860EQY-FJA4_3840x2160_255_AP7_86C_4K_20190107180322_V1.0.10_USBINC_QQ.zip

EDISON_002_XMH811D_4096M_32G_JE695R3HB9N_3840x2160_255_AP7_70B_4K_20190107180339_V1.0.10_USBINC_QQ.zip

EDISON_003_XMH811D_4096M_32G_T750QVR01.2_3840x2160_255_AP7_75B_4K_20190107180354_V1.0.10_USBINC_QQ.zip
